Body:
new_action = action.from_orientation(orientation)
assert new_action.type == type
assert new_action.indices[0] == indices
pytest.mark.parametrize('orientation, action, type, indices', [(Orientation
    (Side.BACK, Side.LEFT), Turn(Side.RIGHT, 1, 3), TurningType.HORIZONTAL,
    -1), (Orientation(Side.TOP, Side.BACK), Turn(Side.TOP, 1, 1),
    TurningType.SLICE, -1), (Orientation(Side.RIGHT, Side.BOTTOM), Turn(
    Side.FRONT, 1, 1), TurningType.VERTICAL, -1)])
